translations: n.硬币；达克特（从前流通于欧洲各国的钱币）

sentences.sentence: You'll have the foal and the hundred silver ducats!
sentences.translation: 你会得到小马驹和100个达科特银币的。

sentences.sentence: So he asked Antonio to lend him three thousand ducats.
sentences.translation: 于是他说求安东尼奥借他三千块钱。

sentences.sentence: So he asked Anotonio to lend him three thousand ducats.
sentences.translation: 于是他就请求安东尼奥借给他三千块钱。
